1062.issue: [E1062] js-controller dependency missing. js-controller 5.0.19 is required as minimum, 6.0.11 is recommended. Please add to dependencies at [io-package.json](https://github.com/ioBroker/ioBroker.lcn/blob/master/io-package.json).

1090.issue: [E1090] admin dependency missing. admin 6.17.14 is required as minimum, 7.6.17 is recommended. Please add to globalDependencies at [io-package.json](https://github.com/ioBroker/ioBroker.lcn/blob/master/io-package.json).

4036.issue: [S4036] Consider adding .vscode/settings.json file with JSON schema definitions for better development experience with Visual Studio Code.

5022.issue: [S5022] Please consider migrating to admin 5 UI (jsonConfig) or react based UI.

5023.issue: [S5023] "package-lock.json" not found in repo! Please consider to commit it to github repository.

6009.issue: [W6009] Multiple copyright lines found in [README.md](https://github.com/ioBroker/ioBroker.lcn/blob/master/README.md) but line(s) 1 missing trailing spaces. Add two spaces at end of each copyright line (except last) for proper formatting.

7003.issue: [W7003] Multiple copyright lines found in LICENSE but line(s) 1 missing trailing spaces. Add two spaces at end of each copyright line (except last) for proper formatting.

8004.issue: [W8004] Please process PR [[#75] "[iobroker-bot] Optimize Dependabot Schedule Configuration"](https://github.com/ioBroker/ioBroker.lcn/issues/75)

9006.issue: [S9006] .commitinfo file should be excluded by .gitignore, please add a line with text ".commitinfo" to .gitignore

0028.issue: [W0028] Minimum node.js version 20 recommended. Please adapt "{'engines' : { 'node' >= '18' } }" to "{'engines' : { 'node' >= '20' } }" at [package.json](https://github.com/ioBroker/ioBroker.lcn/blob/master/package.json).

0034.issue: [W0034] @iobroker/adapter-core 3.2.3 specified. 3.3.2 (or newer) is current. Please update dependencies at [package.json](https://github.com/ioBroker/ioBroker.lcn/blob/master/package.json)

0037.issue: [W0037] @iobroker/testing 5.1.1 specified. 5.2.2 (or newer) is current. Please update devDependencies at [package.json](https://github.com/ioBroker/ioBroker.lcn/blob/master/package.json)

0063.issue: [W0063] "chai, mocha" are included in "@iobroker/testing". Remove from devDependencies at [package.json](https://github.com/ioBroker/ioBroker.lcn/blob/master/package.json)
